Key Match Events: Quinton de Kock complemented Rossouw with 63 off 38 balls
It is now Bangladesh's biggest defeat in T20 format
Post-Match Reflections: Rossouw expressed pride in the team's dominance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rilee Rossouw struck six of his eight sixes between long-on and wide long-on
de Kock struck most of his fours through point and third-man
South Africa scored just 29 runs in the last five overs
Shakib recovered from the initial shellacking, as he removed Rossouw in the 19th over, giving away just four runs
Others: Temba Bavuma's first-over dismissal was a blessing in disguise for South Africa
Nortje blew away the Bangladesh top order in his first two overs
South Africa's only blemish was when Tristan Stubbs dropped Litton Das on 17
